General.Name: Chien Shing Stainless Steel Co Ltd
General.Description: Chien Shing Stainless Steel Co., Ltd. engages in the stainless-steel business in Taiwan and internationally. It engages in the cutting and sliding of stainless-steel coils; trading of various stainless-steel materials; and manufacture of customized stainless-steel applications. Chien Shing Stainless Steel Co., Ltd. was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 222 Industry Road, Tainan City, Taiwan

1.Name: Ms. Li-Yun  Chiu
1.Title: Head of Fin., Accounting & Treasury Department
